Benefits:

  • Save 25% off retail
  • Supports faster charging via 2.1A output
  • Slim 6" x 3" x 0.5" battery size

  • Aluminum power bank
  • Recharge phone ~5 times
  • Recharge tablet ~3 times
  • Built-In LED flashlight (depress button for 1 second)

Quality Control Testing

All electronic devices are thoroughly tested for the following before sale:

  • Verify USB ports charge individually
  • Verify USB ports charge simultaneously (see photo above)
  • Verify power banks recharge
  • Verify power banks hold/retain recharge
  • Verify voltage above 1A from 2.1A port
